name: Dogoo
body:
### Welcome to Dogoo!! 
Dogoo is an RPG being developed by @oshogun, in the C++ Programming Language, and it is completely free to play and open source. It is a game unlike **anything you have played before**, _except maybe for Rogue, Nethack, IVAN..._

![Screenshot may not be representative of final product](teaser.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
